summary: An impoverished young man from Sicily travels to Wolfsburg, West Germany to find work. He takes a job in the Volkswagen factory after he travels through Northern Italy by train.

keywords: new german cinema|italian abroad|courtroom|stabbed to death|girlfriend
title: Palermo o Wolfsburg
